statements: DELETE FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback_id = 100 AND customer_id = 200
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND satisfaction_rating > 2
DELETE FROM ServiceReviews WHERE review_id IN (SELECT review_id FROM ServiceReviews WHERE review_date < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101 AND satisfaction_score < 4;
DELETE FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 100 AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
